Intervention.evidence: comparing drug interventions with placebo or another drug to shorten the onset time of rocuronium

Objective.evidence: This study systematically investigated the most efficacious pharmacological interventions for accelerating the onset time of rocuronium.

Method_Outcome.evidence: Mean differences (MDs) with their 95% confidence intervals (95% CIs) were used to analyze the effects of drug interventions on the onset time of rocuronium.

Number_Randomised.evidence: 43 randomized controlled trials with 2,465 patients were analyzed.

Result_Outcome.evidence: Priming with rocuronium [Mean difference (MD) −21.0 s, 95% confidence interval (95% CI) (−27.6 to −14.3 s)], pretreatment with ephedrine [−22.3 s (−29.1 to −15.5 s)], pretreatment with magnesium sulphate [−28.2 s (−50.9 to −5.6 s)] were all effective in reducing the onset time of rocuronium.
